step.title: Install php7
step.p: Currently, php7 is not available through the standard Ubuntu channels, so a separate repository must be added and then the package-lists updated again.
Only now can php7 and all it's parts be installed.

cmls.cm: sudo apt-get install -y libapache2-mod-php7.0 php7.0-mysql php7.0-curl php7.0-json
